articles.title: Jurgen Klinsmann watched iconic Diego Maradona warm-up in awe as Germany legend recalls 'crazy' Argentina icon with 'super friendly' personality
articles.description: Diego Maradona gave football countless moments of pure wonder - but perhaps his most delightful contribution occurred before one particular match kick

articles.title: Lionel Messi: Argentina captain says 'many things will change' after 2022 World Cup
articles.description: Lionel Messi will reconsider his future in football later this year; Argentina captain says many things will change after the winter World Cup in Qatar; Messi scored in Fridays 3-0 win over Venezuela; Paris Saint-Germain forward turns 35 in June and was recently booed by clubs fans
articles.content:
Lionel Messi says he will reconsider his future in football later this year but said it is likely “many things will change” after this winter’s World Cup in Qatar.
Messi's comments came after he scored in Argentina's 3-0 home victory over Venezuela i... [2806 chars]

articles.title: Lionel Messi Pays Tribute To Fans in Possible Farewell Before World Cup
articles.description: Argentina fans revere Messi, all the more so since he led them to the Copa America in 2021, and the feeling is mutual, with Messi leading his teammates on a victory lap around the ground and chanting and singing along with the 50,000 crowd
articles.content:
Lionel Messi paid tribute to Argentina fans in what could be their last home game before November’s World Cup finals and said the raucous support in their 3-0 win over Venezuela was vital in preserving his happiness.
“I didn’t expect anything less of... [1912 chars]

articles.title: Returning Messi scores as Argentina takes unbeaten run to 30
articles.description: Lionel Messi scored on his return to the national team as Argentina stretched their world-leading unbeaten run to 30 matches.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi scored on his return to the national team as Argentina stretched their world-leading unbeaten run to 30 matches with a routine 3-0 World Cup qualifying win over Venezuela on Friday.

articles.title: Qualifiers: How did Rómulo Otero do against Messi’s Argentina?
articles.description: Although La Vinotinto had nothing to lose, they knew they had to get a good result against the Argentine National Team, where Messi shone with a goal and the sky-blue player Rómulo Otero was also called up. articles.content:

articles.title: Lionel Messi ponders future: 'I don't know what I will do after the World Cup'
articles.description: Lionel Messi scored on his return to Argentina in a 3-0 win over Venezuela and said he will "reassess many things" after Qatar 2022.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi says he will reconsider his future in soccer later this year but said it's likely "many things will change" after the World Cup in November and December in Qatar.
Messi's comments came after Argentina beat Venezuela 3-0 on Friday in the ... [1871 chars]

articles.title: IMF approves USD 44 billion extended arrangement for Argentina to tackle high inflation
articles.description: The International Monetary Fund (IMF) Executive Board approved a USD 44 billion extended arrangement for Argentina to strengthen the country's debt sustainability and tackle high inflation, the IMF said in a statement.
